title: Join us as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to help scale our digital advertising.
job_overview:
Join us as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to help scale our digital advertising.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on performance

Key Responsibilities:

Develop paid media strategies on Google & Meta.

Optimize campaigns to meet KPIs.

Work remotely with freedom and accountability.

Requirements:

Over 1 year of hands-on ads experience.

Analytical skills, result-driven.
